title: Napkin, early 1930s
medium:
Medium: linen (Quality no. 65, lesser quality)
Technique: 4 & 1 damask
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 58.5 x 61 cm (23 1/16 x 24 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Alice Baldwin Beer Memorial Fund
description:
All over pattern of diamonds and a bar with a tapered curled end within a narrow border of triangles.
"DV" in each corner. Openwork (eyelet) monogram in one corner.
